body:
Comment 2 by **carlosalbertomr**: 
By the way, my GTM is -6 so it might not be related with the GMT configuration:

--- FAIL: mail.TestDateParsing (0.01 seconds)
        message_test.go:109: Parse of "Fri, 21 Nov 1997 09:55:06 -0600": got Fri Nov 21 09:55:06 -0600 CST 1997, want Fri Nov 21 09:55:06 -0600 -0600 1997
FAIL
